tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to exposure of sensitive data through stack traces. The fix introduces a dedicated “sensitive” parameter to properly mark and filter sensitive values, ensuring they are not included in stack traces and preventing unintended disclosure during error handling.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `league/oauth2-server` library to the patch version.
vulnerable_to: Generation of Error Message Containing Sensitive Information
